title: Kangana Ranaut wants to get married, but conditions apply - Bollywoodlife.com
text:
Kangana Ranaut wants to get… Kangana Ranaut wants to get married, but conditions apply Kangana Ranaut has a surprising condition before getting married - read details... By IANS | Published: February 17, 2017 4:16 pm Chocolate Day Special: Top 5 chocolate boys of Bollywood 
Kangana Ranaut , who has gone through her share of tumultuous relationships, has revealed that she has found someone she loves deeply, but dating is not on her mind as she wants to take the plunge and get married. In a tete-a-tete with film critic Anupama Chopra, Kangana spoke candidly about her ideology of marriage and how it has evolved with time. 
The actress also mentioned how she wants to get married and settle down, but she has a special condition. She wants a man who will also give his best in their relationship too. As Kangana revealed during the interview, “In your early 20s, you wonder why people get married. In late 20s, maternal instincts kick in and you see things differently. It’s nice to come back to a partner who’s watching your back. I wanted to give my best to a relationship without the baggage of legal relationships. I now want to give marriage my best but the other person must also come with the same attitude.” ALSO READ – Kangana Ranaut: All my exes want to get back with me 
The actress has been reportedly romantically involved in the past with various celebrities including Aditya Pancholi, Adhyayan Suman and Hrithik Roshan . She was also said to have been dating a British man. The mystery around her present love interest is yet to be unravelled. Stay tuned to BollywoodLife as we will be one of the first to tell you about it right here! ALSO READ – “Kangana has a vivid imagination!”, Shahid Kapoor hits back at her allegations that sharing a cottage with him was a nightmare – watch video 
On the professional front, Kangana is currently awaiting the release of Rangoon , which also stars Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan. Post that, she will continue working on Hansal Mehta’s Simran .
